viewData.name: Samsung J6201 55"-Class Full HD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung J6201 55"-Class Full HD Smart LED TV featuring Full HD 1920 x 1080 LED Panel, Motion Rate 120 Enhanced Refresh Rate Screen Mirroring Technology. Review Samsung J6201
viewData.long_description: Enjoy 1080p resolution with your compatible content and the Samsung J6201 55" Class Full HD Smart LED TV. It features an LED-backlit LCD panel and incorporates Motion Rate 120 technology to digitally reduce the blur associated with fast-moving objects. The Wide Color Enhancer will similarly augment the color to produce a more vibrant image, even for SD content.The J6201 has two HDMI inputs for your traditional HD sources and two USB inputs with ConnectShare Movie for multimedia playback from a USB drive. For your analog devices, it has a component video input which doubles as a composite video input. As a smart TV, it has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet.
